#

= Introduction =

This page describes the system requirements.

= Details =

1. Web widget can be embedded in any web page.
2. Widget should suggest bookmarks related to the context of page.
3. Widget should allow user to provide feedback on the relevance of the suggested bookmarks.
   User can vote to "sink" a bookmark. User can also rate a bookmark on the scale of 5.
4. The maximum number of bookmarks that are displayed is configurable.
5. Widget will contain collapsible list of bookmarks
6. The system should be scalable to manage sufficiently large number of requests
7. Widget will display popularity and recentness of the suggested bookmarks
